contextId.information: "330 grams of silver." A shekel weighed eleven grams. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bmoney]])

Translators may use a unit of measure that people understand and a round number: "the 5.5 grams of silver" or "the 6 grams of silver." See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:exo:30:11|3:13]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bmoney]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_bweight]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_fraction]])
